testdat 0.0.0.9014

Expectations: generic expectation helpers

generic-expectations.Rd

These functions allow for testing of a dataset using an arbitrary function.

expect_allany(vars, func, flt = TRUE, data = get_testdata(),
  args = list(), allany = c(chk_filter_all, chk_filter_any),
  func_desc = NULL)

expect_all(...)

expect_any(...)

expect_func(var, ...)

Arguments

vars

a list of columns generated by vars()
func

a function that takes a vector as the first argument and returns a logical vector of the same length showing whether an element passed or failed
flt

a filter specifying a subset of the dataset to test
data

data frame to test. The global test data is used by default.
args

a named list of arguments to pass to func
allany

function to use to combine results for each vector
func_desc

A character function description to use in the expectation failure message.
...

arguments to pass to expect_allany()
var

an unquoted variable name

See also

chk-generic for a set of generic checking functions

Other data expectations: conditional-expectations, datacomp-expectations, value-expectations

Contents
